explanation: [0-0] Two young people in work vests and safety helmets are standing by a table with a tin foil-wrapped object on it. One of them is holding a lit lighter near the object. A door can be seen in the blue background.

[0-9] Next, the young man in the white helmet lights the firework stick, which then emits sparks. He puts down the lighter and runs out, leaving the door open. The young man in the orange helmet looks at the sparks happily. By the time he reacts, the door has been closed by the young man in the white helmet. The young man in the orange helmet tries hard to open the door but fails. He then becomes afraid of an explosion and looks around, trying to find something to use as a cover. Finally, he grabs the green bag by the door and covers his head with it.
